title: Warau Salesman New
original_name: 笑ゥせぇるすまん NEW
ending_song: "Don! Yarare Chatta Bushi (ドーン！やられちゃった節)" by Junji Takada (高田純次)
sinopse: Each episode follows Fukuzou Moguro, a traveling salesman, and his current customer. Moguro deals in things that give his customers their heart's desire, and once his deals are made and their unhealthy desires are satisfied, Moguro's customers are often left with terrible repercussions, especially if they break the rules of his deals...
